step1.description: Create your prompts in PromptHub and organize them with tags and folders for smart categorization

step2.title: Categorize & Tag
step2.description: Use multi-dimensional tagging system to keep your prompts organized and quickly locate what you need

q1.question: What is PromptHub?
q1.answer: PromptHub is a professional AI prompt management platform that helps you centrally manage and quickly use various AI prompts. Whether it's ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, or other AI tools' Prompts, you can manage them all in one place to boost your AI productivity.

q2.question: Which operating systems does PromptHub support?
q2.answer: PromptHub offers full cross-platform support including Windows, macOS, and Linux desktop applications, as well as browser extensions for Chrome, Edge, Firefox, and other major browsers. You can use PromptHub on any device.

q3.question: What is MCP Service Integration?
q3.answer: MCP (Model Context Protocol) is a standard protocol that allows AI assistants to access external tools and data. PromptHub can serve as an MCP server, enabling your AI assistants to directly access your saved prompts for smarter workflows.

q4.question: How do I use my prompts on other websites?
q4.answer: After installing our browser extension, you can quickly open the prompt panel on any webpage using a hotkey (default Alt+O), search and select the prompt you need, and one-click copy or send directly to the current page's input field.

q5.question: Is my data secure?
q5.answer: We take data security very seriously. All data is encrypted and stored securely, with cloud sync and local backup support. You can export all your prompt data at any time, maintaining complete control over your content.

q6.question: How do I import my existing prompts?
q6.answer: PromptHub supports batch import in JSON format. You can organize your existing prompts into JSON format and import them with one click. The system will automatically recognize and help organize them. We also provide import templates and detailed import guides.
